item.text: Solomon made an alliance by marriage with Pharaoh, king of Egypt; he married Pharaoh’s daughter. He brought her to the City of David until he could finish building his residence and the temple of the Lord and the wall around Jerusalem.
Now the people were offering sacrifices at the high places, because in those days a temple had not yet been built to honor the Lord.
Solomon demonstrated his loyalty to the Lord by following the practices of his father David, except that he offered sacrifices and burned incense on the high places.
The king went to Gibeon to offer sacrifices, for it had the most prominent of the high places. Solomon would offer up 1,000 burnt sacrifices on the altar there.
One night in Gibeon the Lord appeared to Solomon in a dream. God said, “Tell me what I should give you.”

<st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">demonstrated</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="02617" class="">loyalty</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st>, my <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> he <st data-num="01980 06440">served</st><n id="2" /> you <st data-num="0571" class="">faithfully</st>, <st data-num="06666" class="">properly</st>, and <st data-num="03483 03824 05973">sincerely</st>.<n id="3" /> You have <st data-num="08104" class="">maintained</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="02617" class="">loyalty</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> by <st data-num="05414" class="">allowing</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> to <st data-num="03427" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st>.<n id="4" />
Now, O Lord my God, you have made your servant king in my father David’s place, even though I am only a young man and am inexperienced.

Your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> stands<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> your <st data-num="0834 0977">chosen</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>;<n id="2" /> they are a <st data-num="07227" class="">great</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">nation</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="03808" class="">too</st> <st data-num="07230" class="">numerous</st> to <st data-num="04487" class="">count</st> or <st data-num="05608" class="">number</st>.

So <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> a <st data-num="08085" class="">discerning</st> <st data-num="03820" class="">mind</st><n id="1" /> so he can <st data-num="08199" class="">make judicial decisions fo</st>r<n id="2" /> your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> and <st data-num="0995 0996">distinguish</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">right</st> from <st data-num="07451" class="">wrong</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">Otherwise</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="04310" class="">no one</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">is able</st><n id="5" /> to <st data-num="08199" class="">make judicial decisions for</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03515" class="">great</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">nation</st> of yours.”<n id="7" />

The <st data-num="0136" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03190 01697 05869">was pleased</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="07592" class="">made</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">request</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="03282 0834">Because</st> you <st data-num="07592" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="01697 02088">for</st> the <st data-num="0995" class="">ability</st> to <st data-num="08085" class="">make</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">wise judicial decisions</st>, and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07592" class="">for</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">long</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="03808 07592">or</st> <st data-num="06239" class="">riches</st>, <st data-num="03808 07592">or</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">vengeance</st> on your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st>,<n id="1" />

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02009 06213">grant</st> your <st data-num="01697" class="">request</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">and</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st><n id="3" /> you a <st data-num="02450" class="">wise</st> and <st data-num="0995" class="">discerning</st> <st data-num="03820" class="">mind</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="0834 03644 03808">superior to that of anyone who</st> has <st data-num="01961 06440">preceded</st> <st data-num="03808 03644">or</st> will <st data-num="0310 06965">succeed</st> you.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="01571" class="">Furthermore</st>, I am <st data-num="05414" class="">giving</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> you did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07592" class="">request</st>—<st data-num="06239" class="">riches</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> <st data-num="03519" class="">honor</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">so that</st> you will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="03808 03644">greatest</st> <st data-num="0376 04428">king</st> of your <st data-num="03605 03117">generation</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="01980" class="">follow</st> my <st data-num="01870" class="">instructions</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="08104" class="">obeying</st><n id="2" /> my <st data-num="02706" class="">rules</st> and <st data-num="04687" class="">regulations</st>, just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">did</st>,<n id="3" /> then I will <st data-num="0748" class="">grant</st> you <st data-num="0748" class="">long</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">life</st>.”<n id="4" />

Solomon then woke up and realized it was a dream. He went to Jerusalem, stood before the ark of the Lord’s covenant, offered up burnt sacrifices, presented peace offerings, and held a feast for all his servants.
Then two prostitutes came to the king and stood before him.

<st data-num="0259" class="">One</st> of the <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “My <st data-num="0994 0113">master</st>, <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> and <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>. I <st data-num="03205" class="">had a baby</st> while she was <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> me in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.

<st data-num="01961" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="07992" class="">three</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> after I <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> my <st data-num="03205" class="">baby</st>, <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="03205" class="">baby</st>. <st data-num="0587" class="">We</st> were <st data-num="03162" class="">alone</st>; <st data-num="0369" class="">there was no</st> <st data-num="02114 0854">one else</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="02108" class="">except</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of <st data-num="0587 01004">us</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">child</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">suffocated</st><n id="1" /> during the <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">when</st> she <st data-num="07901" class="">rolled</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on top of</st> him.

She <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> in <st data-num="08432" class="">the middle of</st> the <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">from</st> my <st data-num="0681" class="">side</st>, while your <st data-num="0519" class="">servant</st> was <st data-num="03463" class="">sleeping</st>. She <st data-num="07901" class="">put</st> him in her <st data-num="02436" class="">arms</st>, and <st data-num="07901" class="">put</st> her <st data-num="04191" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> in my <st data-num="02436" class="">arms</st>.

I <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> to <st data-num="03243" class="">nurse</st> my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">there</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01419" class="">he was, dead</st>! But when I <st data-num="0995 0413">examined</st> him <st data-num="0995 0413">carefully</st> in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>, I <st data-num="02009" class="">realized</st> it <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> my <st data-num="01121 0834 03205">baby</st>.”<n id="2" />
The other woman said, “No! My son is alive; your son is dead!” But the first woman replied, “No, your son is dead; my son is alive.” Each presented her case before the king.
The king said, “One says, ‘My son is alive; your son is dead,’ while the other says, ‘No, your son is dead; my son is alive.’”

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">ordered</st>, “<st data-num="03947" class="">Get</st> me a <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>.” So they <st data-num="0935" class="">placed</st> a <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>.

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> then <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="01504" class="">Cut</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">living</st> <st data-num="03206" class="">child</st> in <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st>, and <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> to <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> and <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> to the <st data-num="0259" class="">other</st>!”

The <st data-num="0834 01121 02416">real</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">mother</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">spoke up</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> her <st data-num="05921 01121">motherly</st> <st data-num="07356" class="">instincts</st> were <st data-num="03648" class="">awakened</st>.<n id="2" /> She <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “My <st data-num="0994 0113">master</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> her the <st data-num="02416" class="">living</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">child</st>! <st data-num="04191" class="">Whatever you do</st>, <st data-num="0408" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> him!”<n id="3" /> But the <st data-num="02063" class="">other woman</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03808" class="">Neither</st> one <st data-num="01571" class="">of</st> us will <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> him. Let them <st data-num="01504" class="">cut</st> him <st data-num="01504" class="">in two</st>!”

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">responded</st>, “<st data-num="05414" class="">Give</st> the first woman the <st data-num="02416" class="">living</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">child</st>; <st data-num="03808" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="04191 04191">kill</st> him. <st data-num="01931" class="">She</st> is the <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>.”
When all Israel heard about the judicial decision which the king had rendered, they respected the king, for they realized that he possessed divine wisdom to make judicial decisions.
